job.title: AI / Machine Learning Engineer (Virtual - Early Career)
job.description: The Lockheed Martin Artificial Intelligence Center (LAIC) team is seeking an inquisitive developer responsible for investigating and implementing services that enhance MLOps deployment as a part of the AI Factory, an enterprise Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (ML/AI) platform. The selected candidate will focus on model test, optimization, monitoring, and explainability. The selected candidate will also contribute to a broad range of projects across the enterprise to increase machine learning availability and value to Lockheed Martin. The Selected Candidate’s Responsibilities Will Include Identifying existing model test and deployment pain points Researching, understanding, and evaluating third-party or in-house technology solutions Developing relationships with third-party technology providers Supporting evaluation initiatives by implementing and evaluating model test and monitoring software solutions Collaborating with MLOps, data, and infrastructure teams Presenting evaluation outcomes and recommend enterprise-wide solution next steps The selected candidate can work at any major Lockheed Martin facility or remotely (in the US). Must be a US Citizen. --
